title: Drawing, "Two saints", ca. 1725–50
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and blue wash on cream laid paper
markings: Verso, collector's stamp in blue ink: MB (no Lugt)
signed: Signed in graphite, lower left: C. Giaquinto
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: In a quatrefoil vegetal frame, a saint is about to step off a boat on shore. He is welcomed by another saint, while a third is bidding him farewell. Left, a crowd of mostly women has gathered.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Two saints", ca. 1725–50.
ca. 1725–50. Pen and brown ink, brush and blue wash on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-8113.
